name: musketeer
rules: Beats Pikemen and if successful during Rounds 5-6 kill an additional unit of a type of your choosing thanks to Advanced Rifling.

name: pikemen
rules: Beats Calvary and if successful prevents your opponent from playing Calvary next hand.

name: calvary
rules: Beats Musketeers and if successful forces your opponent to discard two additional Infantry. If you only have Calvary, lose the battle.
